roleset.name: endeavor

roles.note: This frame differs from undertake-v in the omission of the co-undertaker as a numbered arg. It is expected to be infrequent, and can be covered by argM-COM.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on undertake-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls begin-55.1, confront-98.

example.name: both args
example.text: In their undertaking of social and political issues, the band introduced the term "Afro-German" in to the context of German hip hop

example.name: with COM
example.text: As part of their undertaking with FPIC, Piquero said they expect to finish a complete project design by next month
example.note: make sure the COM is a co-undertaker, and not a 'with' phrase denoting the endeavor.
